item.description:
Dear friends,


I know many of you have wanted to get out to try a class… the winter darkness and need for being home early to cook and cocoon was very real. Now with the time change coming Sunday and spring on our heels, it’s a great time to get out in the evening!

 
If you have never practiced with me before or haven’t been to class in a year or more…


I would like to invite you to try a class FREE!


What: Vinyasa Flow
When: Monday, March 11th or March 18th
          7 PM – 8:15 PM
Where: Solstice Healing Arts, 163 Main Street Suite 6, Medway, MA


You can register here or e-mail: tsgold@verizon.net

We have yoga mats and blocks there!


Please come 10 minutes early so we can chat! And please let me know if you have any questions or concerns prior to class.


Thank you!


Namaste,

Tobi

 

About Tobi… Tobi Gold, MS, CYT has been practicing yoga, breath and mindfulness meditation for 15+ years. She is a Certified Yoga Teacher, who practices yoga and meditation daily and studies with yoginis locally and nationally; she is always happy to share her love of Yoga, Meditation and Creative Expression with her students.
item.name: FREE YOGA CLASS in Medway
